Module banking
Package banking

Class TransactionManagerController

java.lang.Object
banking.TransactionManagerController
public class TransactionManagerController extends Object
This controller class handles events from the UI.
Author:
Mohammed Salama, Dakshal Panicker

    • printAll

      public void printAll()
      Method to display all the accounts in the account database, sorted by the account types. For the same account type, sort by the account holderâ€™s profile (last name, first name and dob.)

    • printInterestsAndFees

      public void printInterestsAndFees()
      Method to display all the accounts in the account database, the same order as the P command. In addition, display the calculated fees and monthly interests based on current account balances.

    • updateInterestsAndFees

      public void updateInterestsAndFees()
      Method to update and display the account balance for all accounts by applying the fees and interests earned.

      Parameters:
      firstName - first name of user
      lastName - last name of user
      dateOfBirth - DOB of user, in past
      initialDeposit - initial deposit for account
      campusCode - 0, 1, 2 codes for different campuses

      firstName - first name of user
      lastName - last name of user
      dateOfBirth - DOB of user, in past
      initialDeposit - initial deposit for account
      loyalCustomer - 0 or 1 based on whether customer is loyal
